entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries late this morning and this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
